With Advanced Vista Codec Package installed, you shouldn&#039;t need to install any other codec or filter. Many user suggested default settings are implemented. This package does not contain a media player and does not associates filetypes. With this package installed, you will be able to use any media player to play DVD&#039;s, movies and video clips such as quicktime, realmedia, avi, mpeg, Flv, swf, wmv, etc. Streaming video can be played within web browsers. By default, you shouldn&#039;t need to make any adjustments to enjoy playback immediately.
